title: Maria Callas: life and art
brief_description: A documentary about the life and career of Maria Callas, from her birth in New York in 1923 to her death in Paris in 1977. Interviews with people she worked with, her accompanist, fellow opera singers, her agent, and her friends are conducted. Included is interview footage of Callas herself. This documentary looks at the character of Maria Callas, explores the woman behind the public persona and the conflict between her personal aims and her ambitions.
